name: ts-f-api
description: Scaffolding for a Typescript poject for a frontend API server
author: Balaganesh Damodaran <asleepysamurai@gmail.com>

scripts.prep: rimraf dist && mkdir -p dist && cp tsconfig.json ./dist
scripts.run:standard: cd dist && env NODE_ENV=development node -r tsconfig-paths/register ./src/index.js
scripts.run:sp: cd dist && env NODE_ENV=development node -r tsconfig-paths/register ./src/scooterParsing.js
scripts.run:standard: cd dist && env NODE_ENV=development node -r tsconfig-paths/register ./src/index.js
scripts.run:inspect: cd dist && env NODE_ENV=development node --inspect -r tsconfig-paths/register ./src/index.js
scripts.run:inspect-brk: cd dist && env NODE_ENV=development node --inspect-brk -r tsconfig-paths/register ./src/index.js
